title: Not earning Blue Essence after matches
body:
Since this new update it seems that I don’t earn any BE anymore after playing matches. I’m still stuck with only 924 which sucks to be honest.
Is it a part of the exp bonus (Yes, I’m getting the exp but no BE) or is it some kind of a bug?

replies.body: Not a bug, riot decided that you will not earn BE after a match, only XP. The only way you get BE is when you lvl up and sell the champion shards for it.

This is correct. It does kind of feel weird that you don't get any currency after matches, but that's just because it's easier to get large amounts of BE in the new system with level-ups and the normal ways of disenchanting shards.
Large amounts? Everytime I level up I get one champion shard thats only worth 90 BE.

"Large amounts" my ASS.

People are getting extremely SMALL amounts. Either increase the amount or give us currency after matches.

Edit: Large amounts over time. 

It's been a single day so far since Preseason hit so nobody really quite knows how well the system is working just yet. Keep in mind, those capsules can give different amounts depending on what level you got to and such. At higher levels you can get more than pre-30, as well as milestone levels giving more than normal levels.

With all that mumbo jumbo out the way, let's all just be a little patient to see just how well the new system works over a little time. It's hard to say exactly how much we're getting with just a single day's worth of data. You're definitely welcome to give all the feedback you might have so far, but it might not reach the ears of the important people here in H&S. I'd really recommend you post this in Client Discussion where the devs can see it easier though!

Here's some great feedback:
If someone is stuck with a tiny amount of BE away from the champion they want directly after a level up(and disenchanting all shards), the new system means they need to get another entire level to unlock that champion.

In the old one, that simply meant one more game.

Were I not already in possession of everything I want, ever landing in a situation like that would probably make me reconsider how I invest my time.

This is REALLY good feedback!!! We've always had a little Gift RP Art program in place to help people out in this example but when they need a little RP instead of IP/BE. In my personal opinion, this program should probably apply to BE as well to help people save time and get a little boost to buying the next thing they want!

For real though, this is the kind of feedback we need with new systems. This directly pinpoints something you're not happy about, why you aren't happy with it, and how it could be fixed in a reasonable way! Please do me a favor and post this over in Client Discussion so the devs have a better chance of seeing it. Our boards don't have a move feature otherwise I'd do it for ya xD

really good? your kidding. The rule is if it doesn't break, don't fix it. NO ONE complaints about this system, and everyone complains about game balance, so why don't you focusing on that area? This is a sh.it fk idea from the Chinese company tencen to gain more money do you think people are blind?

But the system is set up such that a single game feels worthless. The new system actually makes me care less about playing. I felt like I was building towards a purchase with each IP gain before. Now I’m building towards just being able to roll some dice.  I can’t do anything with XP; it isn’t directly valuable like IP was.

That "over time" takes a LONG time. People already are doing the math, and in order to get just one damn champion, you have to level up multiple times and play a ton of games.

This is not what we asked for. Among this I have other things I hate about the changes too so I've been commenting on the gameplay boards. 

Still doesn't do much though. Riot still hasn't commented whole handedly about everyone's agitations about this (awful) preseason.

I feel you fam I really do, but dis poro can't make any kinds of changes or influence the Devs at all. Please make sure you're submitting this feedback over in [**Client Discussion**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) or [**Gameplay **](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance)where it can be taken into account!
The game is gonna lose alot of players because of this
Ugh you should. Whatever.

I have never seen this many people in the League community unanimously agree on a change and I completely understand. How did Riot think this was okay? Nearly EVERYONE is upset and I wish I was exaggerating. There are posts about this everywhere! I hope Riot gets it together because it seems like they are being greedy and practically forcing people to buy RP now, which is ultimately ruining the game.

Totally agree! This really shows how greedy they are.

They already make millions. Now is the time to stop trying to fill your pockets and actually give people what they want!

Come on guys, don't be like that!
They're trying to make a new update to get BE/IP faster, and if it doesn't work (kinda like right now), they're probably gonna fix it!
I saw how they respond to feedback and they're either gonna make you get more BE from capsules or they're gonna make a new system trust me!
people are doing the math man, these cheap bandaid posts aren't gonna cut it...
I mean they give me 3 times ashe amumu garen 270 BE are u kiddin me? to pass 3 levels? In the old system i could gain averagely 3000/3500 for the games i played.

I guess im just lucky i had tons stacked up before this change ?

Still, its a terrible change.

Made new char and im stuck with the ones you give at start after multiple games.......... 

Oh wait I got some skins that i never got b4 tho, used to have to pay for those or play for ages.......first 2 games get char im playing on's skin ?

Cool....thx.

Id rather get more heros :P

It's kinda unbelievable that they did that, and nobody from riot will talk about that, they told us it was a good change, easier to get champions. WRONG, i lvl up to 31 and got 600 BE out of it. Disappointing.

Woah, this actually is really disappointing..
But now that I know, thank you for your help! And let’s hope they’ll at least change it.
I think they will change the system all together or make you get more BE dont worry guys!

Very nice sh.it fck idea, WHO EVER COMES UP WITH THIS SHOULD BE FIRED. This is not SKYRIM, this is MOBA game, OMG dude I lvl up a couple of time and NEVER SAW A DAMN BLUE ESSENCE ADDED, now lvl is JUST A FKING NUMBER and blue essence is PAID BY YOUR MONEY. really? seriously really? Dude.

To the one who comes up with this idea, you SHOULD STOP WORKING IN RIOT, Have some dignity and QUIT, and GO BACK TO CHINA.

I hear why you feel this way. Change is hard, especially when you have been so used to doing things one way.  Adjusting to change does not happen over night it takes time (6-12 weeks in fact). 

Honestly i don't have a issue with the whole BE thing, yes you should get a tiny (tiny tiny tiny) amount after a game just to help with BE accruement (and feels of obtainment) and the costs of getting a champion you are set on. Here is what i am finding.

Leveling up is super easy **REALLY **easy and you get free stuff.I have only leveled to 34 as of today so that's 3 capsules in these i have received 1 Ali, 1 Aniv, 1 MF, 1 Nid, 1 Poppy, 1 Shy, 1 Singed and 2 Taric's, hand full of BE. Considering leveling is infinite!

 I honestly think this is fair considering all the other ways there are to obtain champions eg: RP, BE, GIFT, Capsules from leveling. 

lets not forget the weekly unlocks for draft/blind queue for people to try champions (much rather this then players having easy access and just jumping into ranked with a champ that's new to them.....checks and balances people, and then there is the "My shop" which i think can make a regular return to help with some players concerns.

**TBH Riot do a lot of great work! **Cut them some slack they have practically changed the game for the better rolling forward. YES there will be some tweaks with BE and mechanics this can be expected!!! Just enjoy the new feel to the "In Game" in the preseason and any bug will get ironed out for next season.



**********************************************************************************
**
Guys please remember the below:**

(1) - Quests and Events are regular now - Tokens can be broken down to be too! You have choices you know.
(2) - Games seem to be going much faster. More games in X amount of time  = faster leveling = more BE then before game play changes were made.

**P.S Riot, a couple of suggestions**

(1) - Maybe consider implicating more of (My shop) or some form of rework of it. to get champions and not skins as i think you already give may options for this RP/Shard/Gift/Honor capsule (People shouldn't just get stuff for free all of the time. there has to some investment made by the player.

(2) - This will sound stupid but i will say it any way. Once a week or month release a chest purchasable with BE. In this chest you will have a chance of obtaining 1 champion out of a roster of say 5 or 6 champions( rotating/random) available in the box, champions will be listed on normal pop up box with a buyer beware notice (never will it include champions releases in past 6 months/ 1in 5 rar rar rar). make this so you never get a champion a Summoner already has!

(3) Champion lottery with BE could be fun. doubt it could be done though :( 


Anyways, Thanks for the great work Riot! Heading down the right path!
